league.title: Leagues
league.noVoyagers: This path is quiet… The stars await their champions. ⭐

empty.title: No champions yet...
empty.description: Begin your journey, and let the constellations carry your name across the galaxy.

journal.title: The Voyager’s Journal
journal.description: Record your journey through distant realms. Only today’s tale may change, only you may read it—never share secrets.
journal.placeholder: Whisper your tale into the void of stars...
journal.noEntry: The parchment bears no tale for this day.

avatarEditor.title: Shape Your Essence
avatarEditor.savedMessage: Your magical form has been etched into the stars.
avatarEditor.errorMessage: The enchantment failed to bind. Try again, brave voyager.

empty.title: The Hall awaits your legend...
empty.description: Venture forth, brave soul, and let your story be written in starlight.

adventurer.title: No journeys yet...
adventurer.description: You haven't set foot on any quests. Begin your adventure to explore magical worlds.

wizard.title: No spellwork yet...
wizard.description: You haven't contributed any knowledge yet. Share your magic to help other adventurers.

1.name: Initiate
1.description: Can propose new content within active courses.

2.name: Apprentice
2.description: Can edit and improve their own contributions after submission.

3.name: Adept
3.description: Can review and approve contributions from Initiates and Apprentices.

4.name: Master
4.description: Can revert other wizards’ changes and curate planetary content.

5.name: Councilor
5.description: Can manage ranks of other wizards and oversee the integrity of the course.

tutorial.0: I awaken into chaos. A crowd swirls around me—faces, sounds, lights. It’s overwhelming.
tutorial.1: I try to ask where I am, but the words catch in my throat.
tutorial.4: I shake my head. My voice breaks. More people gather, smiling—but I can't understand any of them.
tutorial.5: “Vorá ke silen tri marakai. Enshi dor va?”
tutorial.6: They aren’t threatening, but the noise builds. My breath shortens. I can’t take it.
tutorial.7: I run. Leaves whip past me. The voices fade behind me like a broken signal.
tutorial.8: The forest is quiet. My chest still heaves, but at least I’m alone now.
tutorial.10: You don’t speak the tongue of this world… and yet, you hear me.
tutorial.11: No time for answers just yet.
